utils.numpy_nest_utils module¶

utils.numpy_nest_utils.apply_to_structure(op, param_dict)[source]¶

Apply the op operation to every entry in the dict

utils.numpy_nest_utils.flatten(d, parent_key='', sep='.')[source]¶

Flatten a given nested dictionary set up, concatenating keys with sep. :param d: The nested dictionary structure :param parent_key: The initial key to prepend to all entries :param sep: the separator to place between nested keys :return: The flattened dictionary

utils.numpy_nest_utils.map_structure(op, *param_dicts)[source]¶

For a series of identically structured dicts, apply op to every same set of entries and return a single dict of the same shape

utils.numpy_nest_utils.reduce_structure(reduce, accumulate, *param_dicts)[source]¶

For every element in the structure, apply the reduce operation and accumulate it to the rest with the accumulate operation

utils.numpy_nest_utils.structured_lists_to_lists(l)[source]¶
utils.numpy_nest_utils.structured_ndarrays_to_lists(d)[source]¶
